fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Spy on a player each night, tracking them and receiving all night feedback they receive (including feedback from their own role).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Grand Saboteur** (Requirement: See a Monkey hanged or be the last Monkey standing)
- Add "You will roleblock your target's target." to your ability. You become roleblock immune.
- Each day you may sabotage a subalignment. Anyone with this subalignment will unknowingly have their abilities fail and attributes nullified during the next night. You may only sabotage the (Killing) subalignment twice.
- Any killing role who targets you is redirected to someone at random. Fails if the attack is Unstoppable or higher, or astral.
**Sticky Bomb** (Requirement: See a Monkey be killed by an opposing REF or be the last Monkey standing.
- You may now instead place a sticky bomb at someone's house. They will not be notified. They pass the sticky bomb to the first person they visit the night after they receive a bomb.

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value:
- If anyone doesn't visit the night after they receive a bomb, the bomb will explode, dealing an Astral Powerful rampage attack. If two bombs meet, they will also explode. You may also remotely detonate the bombs at any time.
- You have protection from your bomb once.
- You may have two bombs out at once.
----------------------------------------------------------------
- You may only choose one upgrade.
- Detection immune
- Astral
